About.title: About fund
About.description: We provide help and support to people in the most difficult life circumstances, strengthening their resilience and faith in their own strength. We strive to create a modern society that becomes stronger, more just and equal, where every person has the opportunity to live with dignity, receive the necessary support and realize their potential.

Footer.discrIcons: Subscribe to support us and keep up with the latest news

donate.description: By confirming your subscription, you allow the “Open Planet UA” fund to debit this and future payments from your card in accordance with their terms. You can cancel the subscription in your personal account on

ProgramWork.title: OUR Programs
ProgramWork.description: Our charitable foundation is dedicated to supporting people who find themselves in difficult life circumstances. We provide assistance in various areas, from humanitarian aid to educational and medical initiatives. Our mission is to create conditions for a dignified life for every individual, helping them overcome challenges and discover new opportunities for growth. Through our projects, we aim to improve the quality of life for vulnerable groups, offering hope and support to those who need it the most.
ProgramWork.noProjectsTitleFirstPart: Soon, you will be able to explore the projects in the
ProgramWork.noProjectsTitleSecondPart: field that we are currently actively working on.

AboutProject.firstTitle: Reconstruction of the bomb shelter for Kyiv School No. 25
AboutProject.firstSubtitle: The purpose of the project (stage I):
AboutProject.firstSubDiscr: Convert the old basement of the school into a modern shelter so that everyone the children and the teacher were able to stay there safely during air raids.
